MyMinesweeper.Core

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyMinesweeper.Core.Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a square of the Minesweeper grid
    Author:
    Lucie

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Square.State
      Enumeration of all different possible states of a square (normal, flagged and open)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int adjacentMines
      Number of mines adjacent to the square (integer between 0 and 8)
      private boolean mine
      True if square is a mine, False if not
      private static int nb_flags
      Static variable representing the number of flagged squares in grid
      private static int remainingSquares
      Static variable representing the number of squares not opened yet
      private Square.State state
      State of the square (Normal, Flagged or Open)

      • changeFlag

        public boolean changeFlag()
        Change square state from Normal to Flagged or from Flagged to Normal The static variable nb_flags is updated.
        Returns:
        true if a flag was added and false if a flag was removed

      • open

        public boolean open()
        Try to open the square and change its state to Open if relevant (not already opened and not flagged)
        Returns:
        true if square has been opened : this mean GUI must be updated false if no change has been made.
